comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.amazon.co.uk/Britain-Meeting-Guildhall-Somerset-House... helps identify the occasion. Some raised hats confirm that the photo is the same. The caption for the photo is "The Great Meeting in the Guildhall when Mr. Asquith Thrilled the Nation on Friday." This is a page from The Graphic, of September 12, 1914. The event appears to have been held on September 4, 1914 This looks to use the same picture too: www.pictorialgems.com/1914-Asquith-s-Patriotic-Speech-In-...

comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Some more recent photos of the Guildhall are available on the venue's website
